name: Build Rome In One Day
description:
If itch embed does not work, visit this URL for the game: https://rome.cividle.com/

Build Rome In One Day is a grand strategy/historical/city builder/incremental mashup, built in November 2022 for Github Game Off jam.

The game is built using my own engine (based on Pixi.js + React.js) that will power CivIdle (currently in development). My goal for developing this game is to further develop the engine by going through the dogfooding exercise myself - especially building a better separation of gameplay code and engine code (which is currently quite hacky)

Source code: https://github.com/fishpondstudio/BuildRomeInOneDay
